Eve Sandler bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi n'ụdị Abstract Expressionism. Sandler, amụrụ na Harlem, bụ nwa nwanyị nke ónyé na-ese ihe na Harlem Alvin Sandler na nwanne nwanyị nke ónyé ọrụ ihe nkiri Kathe Sandler.

Ihe ngosi multimedia nke Sandler "Mami Wata Crossing" bụ akụkụ nkè ihe ngosi 2008, "Mami wata: Arts for Water Spirits in Africa and Its Diasporas" na Fowler Museum. Ọrụ ahụ nyochara njikọ dị n'etiti chi nwanyị mmírí pan-African Mami Wata, usoro ọmụmụ na akụkụ etiti.

Sandler bụ akụkụ nkè otu Black Women Artists, tinyere Carole Byard, Nanette Carter na Howardena Pindell. Sandler bụ ónyé bi na 1990-1991 na Studio Museum na Harlem. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ dịka The Bronx Museum of the Arts
